title: Episode 266 - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
notes: Primary source for episode information including title, air dates, plot summary, character debuts, technique debuts, production credits, opening/ending songs, manga chapters covered, and trivia. Contains comprehensive episode details including animation errors and TV ratings.

title: Doriki - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
notes: Detailed information about the doriki measurement system, including when it was introduced (Chapter 379/Episode 266), how it works via Fukurou's Te-awase technique, and complete doriki values for all CP9 members. Explains that doriki only measures physical power without accounting for Devil Fruits.

title: Gatherine - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
notes: Information about Gatherine's character debut in Episode 266/Chapter 379, her role as a cafeteria worker at Enies Lobby, her personality trait of only caring about men for their looks, and her romantic involvement with Jabra and interest in Rob Lucci.

title: Brand New World - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
notes: Information about the opening song 'Brand New World' by D-51, used for episodes 264-278, making it the 6th opening song of the One Piece anime.

title: Adventure World - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
notes: Information about the ending song 'Adventure World' by Delicatessen, used for episodes 264-278. Notable for being the 18th ending and the last ending theme used in One Piece for 17 years until 2023.

title: Fukurou - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
notes: Information about Fukurou's character, his Te-awase technique debut in Episode 266, his 800 doriki measurement, and his role in measuring all CP9 members' power levels.

title: Rob Lucci - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
notes: Information about Rob Lucci's 4000 doriki reveal in Episode 266, establishing him as the strongest CP9 member.

title: Chapter 378 - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
notes: Information about manga Chapter 378 'Damage Report' which was partially adapted in Episode 266 (pages 7-19).

title: Chapter 379 - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
notes: Information about manga Chapter 379 'Doriki' which was partially adapted in Episode 266 (pages 3-10). This chapter introduced the doriki measurement system.

title: One Piece - Kyojinzoku to no Koubou! Daini no Tobira o Akero! (TV Episode 2006)
author: IMDb Contributors
notes: Episode information including title, air date, and rating (7.8/10). Provides alternative romanization of the Japanese title.

title: One Piece: How Strong is Rob Lucci?
author: Game Rant Editorial
notes: Analysis article about Rob Lucci's strength starting from his 4000 doriki reveal and analyzing his power progression throughout the series.

title: One Piece: Why Doriki was an unreliable power level system, explained
author: XemPlus Editorial
notes: Analysis of the doriki system's flaws and limitations, explaining why it only measures physical power without accounting for Devil Fruits or weapons.

title: Two Piece Podcast: One Piece: Water 7/Enies Lobby Arc Review
author: Travis and Ant
notes: Comprehensive podcast review of the Water 7 and Enies Lobby arcs, including discussion of Episode 266's doriki reveals and CP9 power hierarchy.

title: Enies Lobby Arc - One Piece Manga Bros Podcast (Featuring Merphy Napier)
author: RuffSenpai, BoomSentai, SeeOhKnee, Merphy Napier
notes: In-depth manga discussion of the Enies Lobby arc covering chapters 375-430, including analysis of the doriki system and CP9 power reveals.

title: LUFFY VS 10,000 MARINES!! One Piece Episode 266 & 267 REACTION + REVIEW!
author: Reactor Channel
notes: First-time reaction video to Episodes 266 and 267, providing viewer perspective on the doriki reveals and episode events.

title: Enies Lobby Arc Review
author: One Piece Bazaar
notes: Comprehensive arc review analyzing the CP9 power system introduction and Episode 266's role in establishing the power hierarchy.

title: CP-0 DORIKI (SPECULATION)
author: Worstgen Forum Community
notes: Fan speculation about current CP0 doriki levels based on the baseline measurements from Episode 266. Contains theories about Lucci's current power level.

title: Doriki Discussion
author: One Piece Community
notes: Community discussion about the doriki system's flaws and limitations, particularly how it doesn't account for Devil Fruits.

title: The Douriki Thread
author: MangaHelpers Community
notes: Fan discussion analyzing the CP9 doriki measurements, particularly the close gap between Kaku and Jabra, and what it means for their rivalry.
